short_definition: A homicide; the unlawful killing of a human being through recklessness or negligence, but without malice or intent.
long_definition_html: A homicide; the unlawful killing of a human being through recklessness or negligence, but without malice or intent.

long_definition_text: A homicide; the unlawful killing of a human being through recklessness or negligence, but without malice or intent.
